name: 2ndQuest
description:
As part of the recruitment process for a gamedev group I was challenged to do my own platformer over the course of a week and a half. 
I decided to try to do a celeste-inpired platformer with short rooms and minimal respawn times. 

I made my own spin on the idea exploring a new mechanic involving firing a remote controlled projectile that you can use to propel your character.

--Controls--

It is heavily recommended that you use a gamepad, although it is not required.

Gamepad:

             Jump: A or RB

             Shoot: X or LB

Keyboard:

             Jump: Space

            Shoot: Right or Left Shift
